name: Chroma Lizard
description: The Chroma Lizard has striking, reflective scales that create dazzling displays of light.
memorable: Its ability to create visual illusions and reflect radiant damage makes it a unique adversary.
goals: Typically seeks to defend territory and disorient foes using its light manipulation.
relations: May be found in the company of other magical beasts or wandering alone.
environment: Generally found in brightly lit areas where it can fully utilize its abilities.
strengths: High dexterity allows for nimble movement and evasive maneuvers.
weaknesses: Vulnerability to radiant damage despite having resistance.
attacks: Uses a combination of dazzling visual displays and physical bites and claws.
most_powerful_ability: Dazzling Display can blind opponents, significantly hindering their effectiveness.
skills: Does not excel in perception due to a low score.
additional_information: Can create visual illusions in bright light.
Becomes blinded if it sees its reflection in bright light.
Reflects half the radiant damage dealt to it back to the attacker.
Utilizes multiattack for strategic combat tactics.
Struggles with interactions due to low intelligence and charisma.

nimble lizard with dazzling reflective scales
